title: FS: Elite Eleven Mullin Piedmont 350 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Elite Eleven Mullin Piedmont 350 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Tough tough tough elite eleven card of Mullin Throwing with a Piedmont 350 back. Was planning to send this one off for grading. Really nice condition.  

Pricing has been all over the place.  $SOLD. If price is too crazy, just shoot me an offer over PM.
